title: Classic vanilla sponge cake to enjoy
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '200g butter, softened', '4 eggs, beaten', '200g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons milk', '3 to 4 tablespoons easy peasy buttercream', '3 to 4 tablespoons strawberry jam', 'icing sugar to dust']
